NK001(ka)027:1: slob dpon chen po rdo rje gdan pa jo bo
NK001(ka)027:2: pun+ye sh+r+ais mdzad pa'i dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa'i rnam
NK001(ka)027:3: par bzhag pa tshigs su bcad pa 'di 'chad pa
NK001(ka)027:11: dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa brgyad pa /
NK001(ka)027:13: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK001(ka)027:15: dang bo ma thob pa thob par byed pa blang ba'i tshul 'phros don dang bcas pa ni /
NK001(ka)027:16: sdom gnas bla ma mkhas pa las //
NK001(ka)027:17: gsum la skyabs 'gro blangs nas ni //
NK001(ka)027:19: log par spyod dang bardzuna gyi tshig /
NK001(ka)027:20: chang gi btung ba dag las ldog /
NK001(ka)027:21: yan lag tshang ba cho ga bzhin //
NK001(ka)027:22: bardzuna gyi tshig las ldog pa yis //
NK001(ka)027:23: . yi skyon ni gzhan las kyang //
NK001(ka)027:24: ldog par byas te ldog bshad pas //
NK001(ka)027:25: . yang shin tu smad pa'i phyir //
NK001(ka)027:26: gang phyir lus ngag mi dge las //
NK001(ka)027:27: ldog pa yid kyi dge ba las //
NK001(ka)027:28: . phyir brnab sems gnod pa'i sems //
NK001(ka)027:29: lta las ldog rnams grub pa yin //
NK001(ka)027:30: yan lag lnga yi sdom bshad nyid //
NK001(ka)027:31: gzhug pa ru ni 'dod pas so //
NK001(ka)027:32: gnyis pa bar du mi nyams par bsrung ba'i thabs ltung ba'i dngos gzhi bstan pa ni /
NK001(ka)027:33: mi gsod pa dang dngos po rku //
NK001(ka)027:34: yongs su rdzogs dang gzhan bud med //
NK001(ka)027:35: bdag gir byed dang bardzuna tshig smra //
NK001(ka)027:36: sdom pa nyams pa'i-rgyu rnams so //
NK001(ka)027:37: gsum pa nyams na phyir bcos pa ni /
NK001(ka)027:38: sdom pa slar yang blang bar bya //
NK001(ka)027:40: gzhan dag ji lta bar ni bshags //
NK001(ka)027:41: mkhas pa rnams la yang dag bsdam //
NK001(ka)027:42: bzhi pa bsrung tshul phan yon dang bcas pas mjug bsdu ba ni /
NK001(ka)027:43: 'di ltar sdom pa'i tshul khrims gnas //
NK001(ka)027:44: 'jug pa la yang stobs ji ltar //
NK001(ka)027:45: gus par byas te de'i sbyor bas //
NK001(ka)027:46: 'bras bu sna tshogs des ni ster //
NK001(ka)027:49: khre yi myu gu'i rgyu las ni //
NK001(ka)027:50: s+aa lu'i 'bras bu gang du mthong //
NK001(ka)027:52: dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa brgyad pa /
NK001(ka)027:53: slob dpon chen po pun+ye sh+r+ais mdzad pa rdzogs so ////
NK001(ka)027:54: rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang /
NK001(ka)027:55: lo ts+aa ba dge slong dar ma grags kyis bsgyur ba'o //
NK001(ka)027:56: 'di'i 'grel pa'ng 'di nyid kyis mdzad pa yo. /
NK001(ka)027:57: dpe 'di'anga spar rnying rtsa chen mkhan tshul khrims mthar
NK001(ka)027:58: phyin gyi phyag dpe las kho bo byang chub rgya
